body:
I saw the following nominations, please each nominee respond with a statement accepting or rejecting the nomination before moving on with this:

* @TheEnthusiasticAs _independent nominee_
* @gitr0n1n _independent nominee_
* @stevanlohja ETC Cooperative
* @faraggi IOHK/PegaSys
* @DirtyRusski _independent nominee_
* ~~@kizoojun01 _independent nominee_~~ Edit: spammer removed.

Please do so by end of week so we can transition to 2021 with a new team of editors.

> To familarize myself with who is currently an ECIP editor: @q9f do you have two controlled accounts approved in here?
> 
> So we only have 4 editors with one leaving (Cody)? So 3 active editors?
> 
> https://github.com/orgs/ethereumclassic/teams/ecip-editors

This has to be cleaned up once we updated ECIP 1000. I hope Cody will be available to assist in this transition.
